mapper.sql: id, accountId, parentId, qrcodeUrl, agentLevel, createDate, updateDate, creator, modifier
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO zgk_user_market ( accountId, parentId, qrcodeUrl, agentLevel, createDate, updateDate, creator, modifier ) VALUES ( #{accountId}, #{parentId}, #{qrcodeUrl}, #{agentLevel}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate}, #{creator}, #{modifier} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.update:
UPDATE zgk_user_market
accountId = #{accountId},
parentId = #{parentId},
qrcodeUrl = #{qrcodeUrl},
agentLevel = #{agentLevel},
createDate = #{createDate},
updateDate = #{updateDate},
creator = #{creator},
modifier = #{modifier},
WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE zgk_user_market
accountId = #{map.accountId},
parentId = #{map.parentId},
qrcodeUrl = #{map.qrcodeUrl},
agentLevel = #{map.agentLevel},
createDate = #{map.createDate},
updateDate = #{map.updateDate},
creator = #{map.creator},
modifier = #{map.modifier},
WHERE id = #{map.id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO zgk_user_market ( accountId, parentId, qrcodeUrl, agentLevel, createDate, updateDate, creator, modifier ) VALUES ( #{map.accountId}, #{map.parentId}, #{map.qrcodeUrl}, #{map.agentLevel}, #{map.createDate}, #{map.updateDate}, #{map.creator}, #{map.modifier} )
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM zgk_user_market
AND id like CONCAT('%', #{id} , '%')
AND accountId like CONCAT('%', #{accountId} , '%')
AND parentId like CONCAT('%', #{parentId} , '%')
AND qrcodeUrl like CONCAT('%', #{qrcodeUrl} , '%')
AND agentLevel like CONCAT('%', #{agentLevel} , '%')
AND createDate like CONCAT('%', #{createDate} , '%')
AND updateDate like CONCAT('%', #{updateDate} , '%')
AND creator like CONCAT('%', #{creator} , '%')
AND modifier like CONCAT('%', #{modifier} , '%')
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ${sortBy}
